story.title: Chicago Public Schools Tele-Townhall 12/21/2011
story.description: Chicago Public Schools Tele-Townhall with parents regarding the recently announced proposed school closings and turnarounds ("School Actions"). 189 people on the call. 43 Questions asked, 25 Questions answered. 1 Hour. December 21, 2011 6:30pm

author.name: Josh Kalov
author.bio: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

quote.text: RT @ChiPubSchools: 2 hours 'til the tele-townhall with JC Brizard. What are you going to ask? Call 1-877-229-8493 and enter access code 18528 at 6:30pm.

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

user.name: ChicagoPublicSchools
user.description: Working to provide a world-class education to every student in every neighborhood. Tweets from Jean-Claude Brizard signed -JC. E-mail: twitter@cps.k12.il.us

retweeted_status.text: 2 hours 'til the tele-townhall with JC Brizard. What are you going to ask? Call 1-877-229-8493 and enter access code 18528 at 6:30pm.

data.text: I was referring to the "panel" available to answer questions, including representatives from CPS, AUSL, and an AUSL parent. There was no way to find out how many people were listening.

quote.text: Q1: ChiArts colocating with Doolittle, how will affect Doolittle? A1: Does not change programming at Doolittle. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q1: ChiArts colocating with Doolittle, how will affect Doolittle? A1: Does not change programming at Doolittle. #cps

quote.text: A1: Making sure issues worked out between 2 principals. Committed to working with parents on security/safety and other issues. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A1: Making sure issues worked out between 2 principals. Committed to working with parents on security/safety and other issues. #cps

quote.text: Q2: How will #cps ensure students moving to new school stay safe? A2: Work closely with campus manager, police, cta, etc for safe route

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q2: How will #cps ensure students moving to new school stay safe? A2: Work closely with campus manager, police, cta, etc for safe route

quote.text: A2: Planning on setting up team taskforce (including community) for each situation to identify/address unique issues.

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A2: Planning on setting up team taskforce (including community) for each situation to identify/address unique issues.

quote.text: A2: Brizard- We take this (community) very seriously

user.name: Josh Kalov

meta.text: A2: Brizard- We take this (community) very seriously

quote.text: Q3: What happened with Lincoln elementary / magnet school issue? #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q3: What happened with Lincoln elementary / magnet school issue? #cps

quote.text: A3: Was 1 option, not meant to go out as final sol.. Heard from community & now off the table. Must deal with overcrowding issue. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A3: Was 1 option, not meant to go out as final sol.. Heard from community & now off the table. Must deal with overcrowding issue. #cps

quote.text: Q4: If a school closes, what would happen to students that would have attended next year? #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q4: If a school closes, what would happen to students that would have attended next year? #cps

quote.text: A5: Students will be reassigned to a higher performing school in their area. #cps

user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A5: Students will be reassigned to a higher performing school in their area. #cps

meta.text: A5: Brizard tries to make distinction between these actions and previous admin. actions. #cps

quote.text: Q6 about performance including charters. A6: We are taking action with # of schools in city. Building single accountability system #cps

meta.text: Q6 about performance including charters. A6: We are taking action with # of schools in city. Building single accountability system #cps

quote.text: Q7: Aren't school closings disruptive and damaging for kids? #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q7: Aren't school closings disruptive and damaging for kids? #cps

quote.text: A7: Brizard- I think more disruptive to keep students in poor performing schools. Not doing many closings, more turnarounds. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A7: Brizard- I think more disruptive to keep students in poor performing schools. Not doing many closings, more turnarounds. #cps

quote.text: A7: Brizard- Closings are ultimate admitting of failure #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A7: Brizard- Closings are ultimate admitting of failure #cps

quote.text: A7: Someone else talking about capacity & making sure teachers have training with high performing teachers (Me: sounds like AUSL plan?) #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A7: Someone else talking about capacity & making sure teachers have training with high performing teachers (Me: sounds like AUSL plan?) #cps

quote.text: Q8: Why do i keep hearing turnarounds are experiments? A8: Brizard- "Turnarounds are not experiments!"

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q8: Why do i keep hearing turnarounds are experiments? A8: Brizard- "Turnarounds are not experiments!"

quote.text: A8: "Well documented" evidence, well trained people in building. No excuses. They sweat the small stuff #cps

meta.text: Brizard- Let me be clear, there is no Lasalle situation, because we are not doing anything with Lasalle. Will come back to community. #cps

quote.text: Q9: Is #CPS committed to putting students from closed schools into better schools? A9: Unquestionable going to better schools

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q9: Is #CPS committed to putting students from closed schools into better schools? A9: Unquestionable going to better schools

quote.text: A9: Brizard keeps emphasizing that they chose not to close schools if there was no clear better option available.

user.name: Josh Kalov

meta.text: A9: Brizard keeps emphasizing that they chose not to close schools if there was no clear better option available.

quote.text: Q10: Told my school just needs more money, not turnaround. Why not give more money? #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q10: Told my school just needs more money, not turnaround. Why not give more money? #cps

quote.text: A10: Money can be a good thing if used properly...great teachers, leadership, instructional material. Money by self doesn't solve #cps

meta.text: A10: Money can be a good thing if used properly...great teachers, leadership, instructional material. Money by self doesn't solve #cps

quote.text: Q12: Why are you allowing schools to fail/ be on probation for 2+ years, why not turnaround immedately? #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q12: Why are you allowing schools to fail/ be on probation for 2+ years, why not turnaround immedately? #cps

quote.text: A12: We should have acted sooner. Work is ongoing. Long term problem #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A12: We should have acted sooner. Work is ongoing. Long term problem #cps

quote.text: Q13: How address academic change when moving students to new school?

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q13: How address academic change when moving students to new school?

quote.text: A13: Integration & support from beginning in spring to prepare kids for more challenging environment. Make sure catch up quickly #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A13: Integration & support from beginning in spring to prepare kids for more challenging environment. Make sure catch up quickly #cps

quote.text: A13: Transition teams working with students/parents before end of school year. Also working with staff of receiving schools.#cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A13: Transition teams working with students/parents before end of school year. Also working with staff of receiving schools.#cps

meta.text: A13: Students won't show up to new school unknown. #cps

meta.text: Q14: Where do I find a school to get IEP help for my child? A14: Call office 7735532066 (?) #cps

meta.text: Q15: If changing boundaries for neighborhood schools, will students be able to apply to magnets? A15: Shouldnt be issue for anyone. #cps

meta.text: A19: AUSL- Student will return to a new & improved school. Should be same group of students; new staff

quote.text: Q23: sCHOOL turnaround. Woried about childs feelings with missing old teachers.

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q23: sCHOOL turnaround. Woried about childs feelings with missing old teachers.

quote.text: A23: AUSL-Parent: Will not have any problems..Child had success. Being scared about turnaround natural but it worked out. #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A23: AUSL-Parent: Will not have any problems..Child had success. Being scared about turnaround natural but it worked out. #cps

quote.text: Q24: Why are you paying AUSL to do turnaround, isnt cheaper for CPS?

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q24: Why are you paying AUSL to do turnaround, isnt cheaper for CPS?

quote.text: A24: 2 groups doing turnaround. AUSL has experience/success. Investment in schools. Cost not exuberant. Both AUSL & OSI #cps

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A24: 2 groups doing turnaround. AUSL has experience/success. Investment in schools. Cost not exuberant. Both AUSL & OSI #cps

quote.text: Q25: Why has it taken it so long to make #CPS "more better"?

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: Q25: Why has it taken it so long to make #CPS "more better"?

quote.text: A25: Brizard- $64,000 question...Talks about violence, etc. Proven as city we can make good magnets (Payton, Jones, etc)

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A25: Brizard- $64,000 question...Talks about violence, etc. Proven as city we can make good magnets (Payton, Jones, etc)

quote.text: A25: Allowed to many schools to flounder. Mentions crime again. Have to respond. This admin. is not going to tollerate it.

user.name: Josh Kalov
user.description: Fan of politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

meta.text: A25: Allowed to many schools to flounder. Mentions crime again. Have to respond. This admin. is not going to tollerate it.

quote.text: A25: Wants everyone involved, whether people are yelling screaming or not. As long as we all agree there is a problem. #cps
